summary.para: Implement this method to receive progress notification of the current write operation.

param.name: object
param.para: The interface that initiated the write operation.
This parameter is a MsftDiscFormat2Data object in script.

param.name: progress
param.para: An interface that you use to determine the progress of the write operation.
This parameter is a MsftDiscFormat2Data object in script.

remarks.para: Notifications are sent in response to calling the method.
Notification is sent when the current action changes:

item.description: Once when formatting the media, if required by the media type
Every 0.5 seconds during the write operation

remarks.para: To stop the write process, call the method.

summary.para: Implement this interface to receive notifications of the current write operation.
